text:
Using the CMS menu I select "workflow" -> "schedule" and am presented
with the following error message (snippet shown)

<error>
An Error Occurred org.apache.cocoon.ResourceNotFoundException Resource
not found. org.apache.cocoon.ResourceNotFoundException: Resource not
found.: org.apache.excalibur.source.SourceNotFoundException:
file:/C:/Tomcat5.0/webapps/lenya/lenya/content/scheduler/screen.xsp
doesn't exist. java.io.FileNotFoundException:
C:\Tomcat5.0\webapps\lenya\lenya\content\scheduler\screen.xsp (The
system cannot find the file specified)
</error>

and indeed the file it says cannot be found (screen.xsp) is not there
in the expected location. In fact it is not in the cvs at all but
"scheduler.xsp" is. in that same location.
creator: egli@apache.org
egli@apache.org
text:
A simple solution would be to simply disable the scheduler in the default
publication, i.e. remove it from the menu.

creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text: *** Bug 26285 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
i removed the scheduler from the default publication
creator: gregor@apache.org
